thread.title: Jose Mourinho gives order of the boot to Manchester United ball boys and girls
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho gives order of the boot to Manchester United ball boys and girls

author: gsweet
title: Jose Mourinho gives order of the boot to Manchester United ball boys and girls
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JOSE MOURINHO has changed the ball boys and girls at Old Trafford because the ball wasn’t being delivered back into play quickly enough. 
The Manchester United manager decided to wield the axe because he wanted to increase the pace of play when his team is attacking. Sportimage 3 Jose Mourinho reckoned the previous Old Trafford ball boys and girls weren’t quick enough 
According to the Daily Mirror, he drafted in youngsters from United’s Under-16s for the 1-1 draw with Liverpool last Sunday after growing impatient with the previous standard. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Traditionally, the Manchester United Foundation provided the ball boys and girls but the ever-efficient Mourinho wanted a more organised and tactically aware operation. Related Stories COMATOSED Mischa Zverev says he was 'in a coma' while sending Andy Murray crashing out of Australian Open with stunning win ARE ROO KIDDING? Wayne Rooney celebrates record 250th goal by feeding baby Kit during night in with the boys happy hammers Middlesbrough 1 West Ham 3: Andy Carroll scores twice as Hammers leave Boro just outside the relegation zone FIVE THINGS WE LEARNT Poor refs make players cheat, Pep Guardiola has no fear and Kevin Wimmer is a weak link off the mark Liverpool flop Lazar Markovic set to be sent back to Anfield from loan spell at Sporting Lisbon PAT PLAN Sunderland want Arsenal legend Patrick Vieira to take over from David Moyes if Scot is fired or quits 
The former Chelsea , Inter Milan and Real Madrid coach decided to make the change after the 2-0 home win over Hull in the EFL Cup semi-finals. 
Confirmed a United official: “Yes it’s true that Jose did change the ball boys for the Liverpool game. Getty Images Mourinho recruited a new set of ball boys and girls Stoke 1-1 Manchester United : Rooney breaks Sir Bobby Charlton’s record Getty Images 3 He drafted in a crew from the United 16s set up 
"Prior to that, the task was carried out through the Manchester United Foundation but the manager changed it against Liverpool and brought in boys from one of the Academy teams. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport's daily LIVE blog. 
"We aren’t sure what will happen at future games."
